articles.description: It’s a trend that has surprised many: Why, despite being squeezed by high prices, have Americans kept spending at retail stores and restaurants at a robust pace? One key reason is a relatively simple one: Wealthier consumers, boosted by strong gains in income…

articles.title: Phillips 66 to close California refinery days after Newsom signed oil law - POLITICO
articles.description: The facility supplies about 8 percent of California’s gasoline.
